/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional red and orange accents that add a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The street itself is slick with rain, reflecting the muted colors of the cityscape. A few pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, their figures small against the imposing backdrop of the buildings. On the right side of the street, a green bus is in motion, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The image is a blend of urban architecture and natural elements, presenting a typical day in the life of this bustling city.
